column5: My 12 year old son Alex and I had the opportunity to spend some time with Dave fishing recently and I was moved to post here (after lurking all the way back to "what's biting in Toronto" times...  :-)   )  Dave, and his crew, went out of their way to make my son feel like he was the king of the world.  I simply can't say enough good things about him, and them.  Alex's signed hat is now his prize possession, and he's so "into" fishing now that he actually waded into the creek next to his school and pulled out a catfish by hand! (no lie, and I'm not sure I recommend it, but he's on fire!)  Dave's thoughtfulness added an extra dimension to what was already a memorable father son trip, and both of us thank you Dave!  - Colin (and Alex)  some pix are up at www.colinmarr.com ...  Alex is occasionally borrowing your tagline, Dave ("and that's your facts of fishing!"), I'm sure he'll find his own shortly...   :-)
Great to hear.  Dave is certainly a class act AND a very funny guy.

Score 1 kid for the fishing community...a drop in the bucket compared to the hoards of kids playing video games and surfing the net  Way to go Dave for provifing a positive experience for the boy and his dad  Tony
man ... when that day comes where kids would be in the picture, i beg that he is into fishing!!!!!!  i don't know what i would do if he/she wasn't, probably be devistated!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Yes, I've had the pleasure of meeting Dave and he is certainly someone you would be proud to call your friend.  That's great and I hope Alex enjoys many more years of fishing.  I bet this memory will stick with him forever.  Joey
Atta boy!!  Glad ya had fun!!
Awesome, he's a great guy for sure, not at all surprised you guys had such a great time.  Oh, and welcome to the board...  Maureen
DAVE is a super guy. Funny and always willing to help out.  Great report TFS
yeah, Alex's face here says it all:  http://www.colinmarr.com/gallery2/main.php...g2_itemId=20153
Yup, that smile pretty much says it all....great picture, thanks for sharing  Maureen
